div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2346 C'an Juan d'en Cauna, Ibiza, 1967 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (Almagro) Contents: 121 AE Ebusus: 120 (as Vives MH, pl. 53) Iol: 1 Disposition: Ibiza † Almagro Gorbea, Excavaciones arqueologicas en Ibiza (Excavaciones arqueologicas en España 56, Madrid, 1967), pp. 12-23, illus. Villaronga, GacNum 14 (1969), p. 41
